{{disambig-two: '''Wilcome "Will" Cotton''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].
Will was the youngest son of [[Holman Cotton]]. His brother [[Tolman Cotton Senior
the son of [[Holman Cotton]]: Tom]] named his third child, [[Wilcome Cotton II

{{disambig-two: From [[Old English]] ''willa'' "pleasure" + ''cuma'' "guest"; ''Wilcuma'' is a welcome guest.<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
